alert.note: Alert for Gates (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gates and the south central City of Suffolk through 645 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gates, or 9 miles north of Gatesville, moving east southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Whaleyville around 610 PM EDT. Sunbury and Corapeake around 625 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Easons Crossroads, Savage, Acorn Hill, Drum Hill, Hazelton, Buckland, Sandy Cross, Reynoldson, Somerton and Trotville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
